doc:
Navid Negahban https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Navid_Negahban 0 Navid Negahban (Persian: نوید نگهبان‎; born June 2, 1968) is an Iranian-American actor. He has appeared on 24, Homeland, Mistresses and currently plays the supervillain Amahl Farouk / Shadow King on the second season of FX's Legion. Navid_Negahban ( Persian : نوید_نگهبان ; born June_2_,_1968 ) is an_Iranian-American_actor . He has_appeared on 24 , Homeland , Mistresses and currently plays the_supervillain_Amahl_Farouk / Shadow King on the_second_season of FX 's_Legion .
